pr_title: Implement new fault-tolerance model based on Message negative acknowledgement

timeline.bodyText: What's the purpose of this extra assignment?
timeline.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: Because it must be (implicitly) final to be used in the inner class.
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText:
Has the throwable been logged anywhere prior to this point?
Would it be beneficial to log out the throwable as we're swallowing it? How would a developer know something went wrong without a configured nack?
timeline.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: That's a good point. When you create an instance of Message, you should pass the nack and ack function, but I agree. If by any chance you use this default implementation, we should log the reason (if there is no nack function)
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: Does {} bring in the message? Thought the format was %s or the like?
timeline.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: Ah ok, we may want to re-evaluate that in the future
replies.author: kenfinnigan

timeline.message: Use the SmallRye Common @Experimental annotation to mark SmallRye specific behavior
Add nack method to the Message class

Support nack when the emitter is used to send a payload.

The returned CompletionStage will be completed exceptionally with the nack reason.

Implement new failure management model for the Kafka connector.

The Kafka connector can now handle nack and depending on the strategy fail / ignore / or send the record to a dead-letter-queue.

Add nack support to the AMQP connector

Also define the source fault management strategies.

Update mutiny version to 0.5.2

We need the ability to deal with item and failure in one step.
Handle nack in subscribers (method with @Incoming only)

Add nack support to methods processing messages and payload and returning a single message or payload

Also skip `null` item.

It is now illegal to return null in the ack/nack method

(it should have been illegal since the beginning)
Add nack support to the MQTT (client) connector
Add nack support to the camel connector
Add failure-strategy attribute to the camel and mqtt connectors
The AMQP "acknowledgement" method must run on the event loop having created the message.
The AMQP "acknowledgement" method must run on the event loop having created the message.
